achievements.name: Tales of Monstrous Madness
achievements.desc: Collect the entire "Toki Alley Tales" series.

achievements.name: "Trying to Tame Me?"
achievements.desc: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 1 wild animal.

achievements.name: Natural Born Hunter
achievements.desc: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 30 wild animals.

achievements.name: Zoo Tycoon
achievements.desc: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 100 wild animals.

achievements.name: Overlooking View
achievements.desc: Reach the very top of Qingyun Peak.

achievements.name: The Remains of the Gale
achievements.desc: Reach the top of the tower in Stormterror's Lair.

achievements.name: "Seeds of Stories, Brought By the Wind..."
achievements.desc: Reach the nameless island northeast of Mondstadt.

achievements.name: Unswerving
achievements.desc: Open the chest in the middle of the heart-shaped rock formation.

achievements.name: Initiating Warp Drive!
achievements.desc: Pass through the time tunnel in the skies of Cape Oath.

achievements.name: Beloved of the Anemo Archon
achievements.desc: Take a seat in the hands of the God Statue in Mondstadt.

achievements.name: Nothing to Lose But Time
achievements.desc: Unlock the secrets of two sundials.

achievements.name: Interview with a Bygone God
achievements.desc: Hear the story of a bygone deity.

achievements.name: Crouching Dragon, Hidden Chi
achievements.desc: Learn about the tale of the Chi.

achievements.name: Scourge of the Battlefield
achievements.desc: Fetch a good price for a treasure found in an ancient ruin...

achievements.name: The Best Sword in the Cemetery
achievements.desc: Unlock the Tri-Seal of the Sword Cemetery.

achievements.name: Shadow Over Luhua Pool
achievements.desc: Help Vermeer get the scenery of his dreams.

achievements.name: Ready Player Zero
achievements.desc: Play a simple game with Childish Jiang.

achievements.name: Trees Should Blend Their Roots and Shade, For That Is Where the Home is Made
achievements.desc: Witness the story of Yuan Hong's household.

achievements.name: Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula
achievements.desc: Follow in the footsteps of immortals, and unlock the Domain's door.

achievements.name: Cecilia Garden
achievements.desc: Return the Seelie to their rightful places and unlock the entrance to a Domain in Wolvendom.

achievements.name: Hidden Palace of Zhou Formula
achievements.desc: Follow the Seelie and light the torches to unlock the entrance to a domain in Wuwang Hill.

achievements.name: "If you put your heart into it..."
achievements.desc: Cook 1 suspicious-tasting dish.

achievements.name: "...Anyone can be a gourmet."
achievements.desc: Cook 10 suspicious-tasting dishes.

achievements.name: Boared to Death
achievements.desc: Be defeated by a wild boar.

achievements.name: Golden Gliding License
achievements.desc: Glide a long, long distance in one go.

achievements.name: It's the Same As Having Wings
achievements.desc: Glide continuously for over 80s.

achievements.name: Quick As Lightning
achievements.desc: Sprint continuously (or use an alternative sprint) for over 15s.

achievements.name: Friends the World Over
achievements.desc: Meet all sorts of people during your adventure.

achievements.name: Megastar in Mondstadt
achievements.desc: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Mondstadt.

achievements.name: Legend in Liyue
achievements.desc: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Liyue.

achievements.name: Illustrious in Inazuma
achievements.desc: Reach Reputation Lv. 10 in Inazuma.

achievements.name: QUEST CLEAR
achievements.desc: Complete 10 Bounties.

achievements.name: QUEST CLEAR
achievements.desc: Complete 20 Bounties.

achievements.name: QUEST CLEAR
achievements.desc: Complete 30 Bounties.

achievements.name: Hero-in-Training
achievements.desc: Complete 10 Requests.

achievements.name: Hero-in-Training
achievements.desc: Complete 20 Requests.

achievements.name: Hero-in-Training
achievements.desc: Complete 30 Requests.

achievements.name: QUEST FAILED
achievements.desc: Lost track of a Bounty target.

achievements.name: The Bleak Midwinter
achievements.desc: Succumb to Sheer Cold...

achievements.name: Priest, Princess, and Scribe
achievements.desc: Claim the treasure of the Entombed City.

achievements.name: Prodigal Son's Return
achievements.desc: Follow the path of one of the members of the long-lost investigation team to where they embarked on their journey home.

achievements.name: Snow-Stored History
achievements.desc: Discover the fate of a long-lost investigation team that once explored Dragonspine.

achievements.name: Glacial Steel
achievements.desc: Obtain an ancient weapon made of Starsilver.

achievements.name: Futile Endeavor
achievements.desc: Discover the remains of many ruin machines.

achievements.name: Untellable Tale
achievements.desc: Make an unexpected friend in an unexpected location.

achievements.name: Towering Achievement
achievements.desc: Reach the summit of Dragonspine.

achievements.name: Winter Wonderland
achievements.desc: Discover a Cryo Crystalfly beneath a snow pile.

achievements.name: The Hunter Becomes the Hunted
achievements.desc: Be defeated by The Great Snowboar King.

achievements.name: Chill Out!
achievements.desc: Defeat The Great Snowboar King while the latter is in berserker mode.

achievements.name: Glutton for Goulash
achievements.desc: Learn to make Goulash.

achievements.name: Wrath of the Gods
achievements.desc: Get struck by lightning.

achievements.name: Sky High
achievements.desc: Climb the Skyfrost Nail after it has been restored.

achievements.name: Transmutation Nuclide
achievements.desc: Use the Parametric Transformer to complete one material transmutation.

achievements.name: ...You could hear Paimon all along, couldn't you?
achievements.desc: Even Paimon gets tired sometimes.

achievements.name: Yo-Ho-Ho, and a Bottle of Dandelion Wine
achievements.desc: Climb aboard your Waverider.

achievements.name: Mighty and Illuminated Wave Rider
achievements.desc: Continuously sail your Waverider for a certain period of time.

achievements.name: Nice Boat!
achievements.desc: Switch Waveriders with another player.

achievements.name: ...And Her Name Is the Mary Celeste
achievements.desc: Suffer the destruction of your Waverider...

achievements.name: Déjà Vu!
achievements.desc: Continuously sail your Waverider at high speeds for a certain period of time.

achievements.name: Yamada Go's Wooden Mallet
achievements.desc: See through the illusions of the Tanuki several times.

achievements.name: "Kujirai Art, Temari Jutsu"
achievements.desc: Play a game of Temari with Kujirai.

achievements.name: Temari for Life
achievements.desc: Have another player join a game of Temari that you are hosting.

achievements.name: Paimon's Lucky Day!
achievements.desc: Draw a "Great Fortune" fortune slip at the Grand Narukami Shrine.

achievements.name: Just My Luck...
achievements.desc: Draw a "Great Misfortune" slip at the Grand Narukami Shrine

achievements.name: Underground... Overrated?
achievements.desc: Sometimes, the real treasure is the things you learn along the way.

achievements.name: SHUUMATSU GAIDEN
achievements.desc: Get caught up in the fight between the Shuumatsuban and the Fatui...

achievements.name: Iwakura Out
achievements.desc: Witness the end of the Iwakura Clan.

achievements.name: Who Let the Dogs Out
achievements.desc: Set Toratarou free.

achievements.name: You Can't Help Your Feelings
achievements.desc: Help Hiromi resolve his angst.

achievements.name: They Shall Not Grow Old
achievements.desc: Pay your respects to the deceased.

achievements.name: Oh, the Humanity!
achievements.desc: Witness the fate of the Samurai.

achievements.name: A Hollow Soul
achievements.desc: Find Washizu's lost possessions.

achievements.name: Rise and Shrine
achievements.desc: Find all the shrines on Yashiori Island.

achievements.name: ...And I Would Walk 3,000 More
achievements.desc: Find Chouji on Tatarasuna and Narukami Island.

achievements.name: A Doctor's Odyssey
achievements.desc: Find out what happened to Yasumoto.

achievements.name: Knock Knock
achievements.desc: Disable the containment dome surrounding the Mikage Furnace.

achievements.name: Kannazuka Battle Plan
achievements.desc: Defeat the revived Electro Hypostasis.

achievements.name: Why We Fight
achievements.desc: Help Masanori return to his senses.

achievements.name: Oowazamono
achievements.desc: Defeat Masanori with ease.

achievements.name: Second Blooming
achievements.desc: Obtain Hanayama Kaoru's gift.

achievements.name: Thank You, Come Again
achievements.desc: Obtain the grand prize from Takashi's chests.

achievements.name: Shocking... Positively Shocking
achievements.desc: Get struck down by Balethunder...

achievements.name: Jackpot
achievements.desc: Use the Kamuijima Cannon to reveal a treasure trove.

achievements.name: Blade of Tatara
achievements.desc: Obtain the diagram of a certain weapon from the past.

achievements.name: Rest in Peace
achievements.desc: End the wrath of 10 deceased samurai.

achievements.name: "That's What They Call a Getaway!"
achievements.desc: Allow a struggling fish to get off the hook.

achievements.name: "Oh, so That's How You Fish..."
achievements.desc: Scare the fish away when casting your rod.

achievements.name: As You Wish
achievements.desc: Have your fortune told 5 times by Granny Komaki while obtaining an ideal result.

achievements.name: A Mermaid's Tale
achievements.desc: Help Kumi with her problem.

achievements.name: A Distant Sea Shepherd's Treasure
achievements.desc: Gain the most valued treasure of a great pirate from the ramblings of drunkards.

achievements.name: Long John Silver
achievements.desc: Find all of Rinzou's buried treasure.

achievements.name: Today, This Seal — Tomorrow, Watatsumi Island!
achievements.desc: Break the seal over the Electro Archon's shrine.

achievements.name: Palace in a Pool
achievements.desc: Unlock "Palace in a Pool"

achievements.name: The Stranding of the Beagle
achievements.desc: Explore Watatsumi Island, following in the footsteps of an unknown researcher.

achievements.name: "I am a cat named Neko."
achievements.desc: Meet Neko, the "Provisional Head Priestess of the Asase Shrine."

achievements.name: Cat in the Clouds
achievements.desc: Witness a "good thing" come lately together with Neko, the "Provisional Head Priestess of the Asase Shrine."

achievements.name: A Cat's Gift
achievements.desc: Feed the kittens on Seirai Island and gain their affection.

achievements.name: It Has to Be Treasure
achievements.desc: "I already told you, it's just a picture!"

achievements.name: On the Other Side of Homesickness
achievements.desc: Help Oda Tarou take four pictures of Seirai Island.

achievements.name: This and That...
achievements.desc: ... Try connecting them?

achievements.name: Davy Jones' Locker
achievements.desc: Unlock all the mechanisms onboard the "Seiraimaru."

achievements.name: Sea of Puzzles
achievements.desc: Unlock one series of mechanisms on Seirai Island

achievements.name: Great Amakumo Peak
achievements.desc: Unlock the mechanism beneath Amakumo Peak

achievements.name: Traverse the Fog Door
achievements.desc: Get used to Tsurumi Island's odd weather.

achievements.name: Nihil Sub Caligine Novum
achievements.desc: Seems like you're back to square one...

achievements.name: White's Illusion
achievements.desc: Encounter the illusions of the ancient past

achievements.name: "Lovely Sights, Further Than the Eye Can See"
achievements.desc: Bid farewell to your boatman.

achievements.name: A Tale of Two Cities
achievements.desc: Even Tsurumi Island seems to be built atop the wreckage of ancient ruins.

achievements.name: "My Life as an Adventurer"
achievements.desc: Help Roald to complete his adventure diary.

achievements.name: Light Up the Fog
achievements.desc: Light up all the Stormstones on the Autake Plains.

achievements.name: "P—Paimon ate it..."
achievements.desc: Have the Maushiro that you got go missing.

achievements.name: Guessing Game
achievements.desc: From an even more distant past to the present day...

achievements.name: Thunderbird's Lineage
achievements.desc: Complete all the statue challenges.

achievements.name: Seven Letters
achievements.desc: Try to decipher the Ishine Script.

achievements.name: Moshiri Kara
achievements.desc: Unlock Moshiri Kara.

achievements.name: Across the Misty River
achievements.desc: You finally reach the far side of the Sea of Fog...

achievements.name: "Not Flyin' Away This Time!"
achievements.desc: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 1 Crystalfly.

achievements.name: The Net Closes In
achievements.desc: Use the Omni-Ubiquity Net item to capture 1 Finch.

achievements.name: N-Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
achievements.desc: Enter Enkanomiya.

achievements.name: Flowing Sunfire, Also Known as Marishi
achievements.desc: Unlock the secret at the Sunfire Gate.

achievements.name: Of Sun and Moon
achievements.desc: Switch between Whitenight and Evernight once.

achievements.name: "Extensive And Meticulous"
achievements.desc: Receive the Jibashiri's acknowledgment.

achievements.name: "The Eel in Winter Sought"
achievements.desc: Receive the Jibashiri's acknowledgment.

achievements.name: "Unmatched Throughout Tokoyo"
achievements.desc: Receive the Jibashiri's acknowledgment.

achievements.name: "Maybe Get Yourself a More Social Hobby..."
achievements.desc: Complete Date's labyrinth challenge.

achievements.name: "If Tokoyo Ookami Knew of This..."
achievements.desc: Return all the library books, and...

achievements.name: "What Difference Does This Make?"
achievements.desc: Sit at every single special spot.

achievements.name: The Children of God Shall Dance
achievements.desc: Speak to all the Phaethon afterimages.

achievements.name: Light and Dark, Dusk and Dawn
achievements.desc: Head to the top of the Dainichi Mikoshi.

achievements.name: Step Right Up!
achievements.desc: Complete the archery challenge.

achievements.name: The Ill-Starred Legacy of Iwakura
achievements.desc: Return the blade of the Iwakura Master.

achievements.name: One Key for Each Lock
achievements.desc: Find all the Key Sigils.

achievements.name: Juggernaut
achievements.desc: Crush all of a Geo Hypostasis' Rock Pillars of Revival before it can be revived.

achievements.name: The PRISM Program
achievements.desc: Break all of an Electro Hypostasis' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.

achievements.name: "That's one big Crystalfly"
achievements.desc: Absorb all of an Anemo Hypostasis' Wind Crystals before it can be revived.

achievements.name: "That's one big Crystalfly"
achievements.desc: Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis before it can absorb any crystals.

achievements.name: "...Not indicative of final product"
achievements.desc: Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis that has undergone 4 types of Elemental Conversions.

achievements.name: The Bigger They Are...
achievements.desc: Paralyze a Ruin Guard by attacking its weak point.

achievements.name: Through Pass
achievements.desc: Knock a Pyro Slime out of the hands of a Hilichurl Grenadier.

achievements.name: Dolorous Stroke
achievements.desc: Defeat an opponent by Shattering the ice they are trapped in.

achievements.name: Golden Bell Shield
achievements.desc: Gain over 1 minute's worth of continuous shielding through Crystallize Reactions.

achievements.name: Hilichurl Champion
achievements.desc: Defeat a Stonehide Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

achievements.name: Justice Falling
achievements.desc: Hit an opponent after falling for over 5s with a Plunging Attack.

achievements.name: Bon Appétit
achievements.desc: Have 4 party members in the Full state at the same time.

achievements.name: Purveyor of Punishment
achievements.desc: Deal over 5,000 CRIT DMG.

achievements.name: Purveyor of Punishment
achievements.desc: Deal over 20,000 CRIT DMG.

achievements.name: Purveyor of Punishment
achievements.desc: Deal over 50,000 CRIT DMG.

achievements.name: Fantastic Four
achievements.desc: Complete a Domain using 4 characters of the same Elemental Type.

achievements.name: "Take That, You Overblown Mist Flower!"
achievements.desc: Defeat a Cryo Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

achievements.name: "That Was Blooming Hot"
achievements.desc: Defeat a Pyro Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

achievements.name: Outlander Vs. Outlander
achievements.desc: Defeat Childe without any party member being marked and then hit by his follow-up attack.

achievements.name: Penalty
achievements.desc: There are places where one cannot simply dig Pyro Slimes out of the ground...

achievements.name: Force Field Erosion
achievements.desc: Destroy the Electro Hypostasis' barrier.

achievements.name: "...Lizard-Spock"
achievements.desc: Have one character get hit by all three parts of the rock-paper-scissors attack consecutively.

achievements.name: A House Ill-Founded
achievements.desc: Cause the same Geo Hypostasis to fall three times by destroying the Basalt Column that it is on.

achievements.name: None Stand Secure
achievements.desc: Force the Geo Hypostasis into its revival state without destroying any Basalt Columns.

achievements.name: Back With The Wind
achievements.desc: Absorb at least 10 Elemental Orbs created by the Anemo Hypostasis in a single battle.

achievements.name: Core Meltdown
achievements.desc: Destroy the Blazing Seed created by a Pyro Regisvine.

achievements.name: Knockout
achievements.desc: Destroy a Cryo Regisvine's corolla weak point while it is performing its rotary spray attack.

achievements.name: "...Till Debt Do Us Part"
achievements.desc: Defeat a Fatui Agent while they are in their stealth mode.

achievements.name: "Melting... Away..."
achievements.desc: Defeat a Cryo Cicin Mage while all her Cryo Cicins are currently active.

achievements.name: And You Call Yourself One of the Four Winds
achievements.desc: Defeat an Anemoboxer Vanguard after having triggered all of their Elemental Absorptions.

achievements.name: Touch and Go
achievements.desc: Use a shield to counter a Geovishap's charging attack.

achievements.name: Deflection!
achievements.desc: Use a shield to counter a Primo Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack.

achievements.name: You Can Have Those Back!
achievements.desc: Use a shield of a matching type (or a Geo shield) to counter a Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack and deal immense DMG.

achievements.name: Sternest of Souls
achievements.desc: Defeat Azhdaha in all its forms.

achievements.name: "...A Single Night's Work"
achievements.desc: Defeat a Cryo Hypostasis that is in a weakened state.

achievements.name: "Knee-Deep Snow..."
achievements.desc: Defeat a Cryo Hypostasis that has revived three times.

achievements.name: If I Run Fast Enough...
achievements.desc: Defeat a Maguu Kenki without being hit by its phantom's attacks.

achievements.name: In This Solemn Matter Let No One Interfere!
achievements.desc: Defeat a Maguu Kenki without triggering its "Oushi no Omote" parry.

achievements.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
achievements.desc: Defeat a Primo Geovishap without reflecting its Primordial Shower.

achievements.name: Burned Yourself, Did You?
achievements.desc: Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis that has reignited twice.

achievements.name: Smells like Animal Spirit!
achievements.desc: Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis after being hit by its mimetic 3-hit combo.

achievements.name: Core Breakthrough
achievements.desc: Defeat a Perpetual Mechanical Array after paralyzing all 4 types of its Ruin Sentinels.

achievements.name: Could All Uninvolved Machinery Please Leave Immediately?
achievements.desc: Defeat the Perpetual Mechanical Array without defeating any of its Ruin Sentinels.

achievements.name: Fight Fire With Fire
achievements.desc: Defeat a Kairagi: Fiery Might while their weapon is infused with Pyro.

achievements.name: Ride the Lightning
achievements.desc: Defeat a Kairagi: Dancing Thunder while their weapon is infused with Electro.

achievements.name: I Hear Thunder...
achievements.desc: Be struck by the lightning called down by a Crackling Axe Mitachurl...

achievements.name: Dry Clean
achievements.desc: Defeat the Hydro Hypostasis without destroying a single one of its Water Droplets (except when it is restoring HP.)

achievements.name: Bio-Oceanic Weapon
achievements.desc: Be hit by a certain animal created by the Hydro Hypostasis...

achievements.name: Love and Non-Communication
achievements.desc: Defeat a Thunder Manifestation without ever being locked onto.

achievements.name: Thunder Fall
achievements.desc: Defeat a Thunder Manifestation while it is in flight.

achievements.name: Icy Rivers, Crimson Witch
achievements.desc: Defeat Signora without destroying either her Hearts of Flame or Eyes of Frost.

achievements.name: Inugami's End
achievements.desc: Destroy two Rifthound Skulls within a short time.

achievements.name: Hard Landing
achievements.desc: Bring a climbing Bathysmal Vishap down.

achievements.name: Impeccable Judgment
achievements.desc: Only shoot down your real opponent...

achievements.name: Beware of Angry Dog
achievements.desc: Defeat a roaring Rifthound.

achievements.name: Basically Harmless
achievements.desc: Defeat a Specter that has not accumulated any Fury.

achievements.name: The End of the Beginning
achievements.desc: Complete the Mondstadt Archon Quests.

achievements.name: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
achievements.desc: Complete "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

achievements.name: For a Tomorrow Without Tears
achievements.desc: Complete "For a Tomorrow Without Tears."

achievements.name: Song of the Dragon and Freedom
achievements.desc: Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom."

achievements.name: Let the Wind Lead
achievements.desc: Obtain the power of Anemo.

achievements.name: ...Or a New Storm?
achievements.desc: Banish the dragon attacking Mondstadt.

achievements.name: Knighthood Excellence
achievements.desc: Become an Honorary Knight of Favonius.

achievements.name: Knights and their Knotty Issues
achievements.desc: Fail to borrow the Holy Relic... but learn of the Knights' dilemma.

achievements.name: Winds Change Their Course
achievements.desc: Be rescued by Dvalin.

achievements.name: Of the Land Amidst Monoliths
achievements.desc: Complete "Of the Land Amidst Monoliths"

achievements.name: Farewell, Archaic Lord
achievements.desc: Complete "Farewell, Archaic Lord."

achievements.name: Outlandish Behavior
achievements.desc: Be rescued by an outsider at the "tourist spot that locals don't go to."

achievements.name: Silly-Billy Churlish Ghoul
achievements.desc: Agree to play with Dusky Ming.

achievements.name: That Smells Divine
achievements.desc: Figure out which perfume Rex Lapis is fond of.

achievements.name: It's Bigger on the Inside
achievements.desc: Clean Madame Ping's teapot.

achievements.name: Ticked, Tacked, and Towed
achievements.desc: Commission others to finish your work, unfettered by such things as Mora.

achievements.name: Respecting Cultural Heritage
achievements.desc: You failed to find the Cocogoat... but manage to repair a mechanism.

achievements.name: The Long Goodbye
achievements.desc: Prepare everything necessary for the Rite of Parting.

achievements.name: Icing on the Slime
achievements.desc: Create a box of lovely, jubbly Sugar-Frosted Slimes.

achievements.name: Sky's the Limit
achievements.desc: Reach Liyue's "mansion in the sky".

achievements.name: Lily Loves Music
achievements.desc: Sing a song of Mondstadt to the Glaze Lilies...

achievements.name: I'll Let You Off... This Time
achievements.desc: Defeat Childe.

achievements.name: Derailed
achievements.desc: Defeat the Overlord of the Vortex.

achievements.name: Final Farewell
achievements.desc: Take part in the Rite of Parting.

achievements.name: A New Star Approaches
achievements.desc: Complete "A New Star Approaches".

achievements.name: Pirates! Argh!
achievements.desc: Play a game of pirates with Little Lulu, Little Fei, and Little Meng.

achievements.name: A Nourishing Friendship
achievements.desc: Complete "Fishing Jiangxue" and "Yanxiao's Dilemma."

achievements.name: Love Is All Around
achievements.desc: In "Good Sign," help Zhihua find 5 signs that romance is coming his way.

achievements.name: For the Love of Godwin
achievements.desc: Finish "Whispers in the Wind" 5 times.

achievements.name: Level Up
achievements.desc: Help Huai'an repair Wangshu Inn's broken bridge.

achievements.name: Beginner's Luck
achievements.desc: Select the highest-value jade on your first try.

achievements.name: Taking Responsibility for Your Actions
achievements.desc: Apologize to Timmie.

achievements.name: Making Do
achievements.desc: Only bring materials for a training dummy to Herman.

achievements.name: Instant Karma
achievements.desc: Expose Marjorie and receive Jack's thanks.

achievements.name: "Dear Daddy..."
achievements.desc: Hear Timmie's story.

achievements.name: Marvelous Medicine
achievements.desc: Cure Anna's illness.

achievements.name: In the Name of Favonius
achievements.desc: Witness Jilliana's tale.

achievements.name: Curious Concoction
achievements.desc: Complete the mysterious cocktail.

achievements.name: Scholarly Pretensions
achievements.desc: Complete "The Lost Relic" and "A Little Raid."

achievements.name: Poet Vs. Paycheck
achievements.desc: Complete "So-called Work" and receive Linling's poetry anthology.

achievements.name: All's Well That Ends Well
achievements.desc: Complete the quest "For Old Time's Sake."

achievements.name: This Novel Is Amazing!
achievements.desc: Steal a peek at Chang the Ninth's draft manuscript.

achievements.name: Open to Interpretation
achievements.desc: Ruin 4 signs of an imminent romance.

achievements.name: Get Your Own Emergency Food!
achievements.desc: Consume the food during "Food Delivery"...?

achievements.name: Hidden in Plain Sight
achievements.desc: Help Sango and Ryuuji solve the case.

achievements.name: Is There But One Truth...?
achievements.desc: Witness Ryuuji's tale.

achievements.name: Liyue Ichiban
achievements.desc: Heal Tang Wen with some delicious dishes.

achievements.name: Boom Shaka-Laka, More Boom-Shaka-Laka
achievements.desc: Consult Xiangling regarding special cooking methods

achievements.name: Meal For Two
achievements.desc: Help both Xudong and Kamei Munehisa make a dish once.

achievements.name: A Question of Diet
achievements.desc: Help Parvaneh proofread all the recipes.

achievements.name: Samurice
achievements.desc: Help Kamei Munehisa collect ingredients from the camps on either side.

achievements.name: "Sorry for the Trouble!"
achievements.desc: Receive the complaint that Konda Densuke lodges in "Post-Sale Service."

achievements.name: Samurai Gourmet
achievements.desc: Witness Kamei Munehisa's induction into the Gourmet Supremos.

achievements.name: Hello...! Anyone in here...?
achievements.desc: Discover a secret passageway in Ritou.

achievements.name: Editorial Opinion
achievements.desc: Help Shigeru and Junkichi return to the right artist path.

achievements.name: You Should Start A Doushin Dojo
achievements.desc: Help Asakura train 5 times.

achievements.name: Guess Who?
achievements.desc: Find out who Zhenyu really is.

achievements.name: Well, At Least It Ended
achievements.desc: Hear Junkichi out as he puts his story together.

achievements.name: Her and Her Cat
achievements.desc: Follow Neko up Mt. Yougou to find "Hibiki"'s trail.

achievements.name: Nothing to Lose But Time
achievements.desc: Unlock the secrets of two sundials.

achievements.name: Interview with a Bygone God
achievements.desc: Hear the story of a bygone deity.

achievements.name: Crouching Dragon, Hidden Chi
achievements.desc: Learn about the tale of the Chi.

achievements.name: Scourge of the Battlefield
achievements.desc: Fetch a good price for a treasure found in an ancient ruin...

achievements.name: Shadow Over Luhua Pool
achievements.desc: Help Vermeer get the scenery of his dreams.

achievements.name: Ready Player Zero
achievements.desc: Play a simple game with Childish Jiang.

achievements.name: Trees Should Blend Their Roots and Shade, For That Is Where the Home is Made
achievements.desc: Witness the story of Yuan Hong's household.

achievements.name: Gears of Destiny
achievements.desc: Complete the quest "Bough Keeper: Dainsleif".

achievements.name: The Bandit, the Lunatic, and the Pitch-Black Enigma
achievements.desc: Uncover the Grand Thief's fate.

achievements.name: Where Fate Comes to a Crossroads
achievements.desc: Escape the eerie ruins.

achievements.name: Sneering at the Power of the Gods
achievements.desc: Learn of the "Loom of Fate"...

achievements.name: Silence, You Raving Lunatic
achievements.desc: Defeat the Abyss Herald.

achievements.name: We Will Be Reunited
achievements.desc: Complete "We Will Be Reunited."

achievements.name: The Gathering Storm
achievements.desc: Earn the chance to go to Inazuma on board the Alcor.

achievements.name: Ready, Fight!
achievements.desc: Earn your first victory in The Crux Clash.

achievements.name: Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves
achievements.desc: Complete "Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves."

achievements.name: Through the Storm
achievements.desc: Reach the Outsider Settlement.

achievements.name: Hiiragi Sanjuuro
achievements.desc: Escort the goods successfully and leave Ritou.

achievements.name: The Aspirations of All
achievements.desc: Come into contact with the Statue of the Omnipresent God, the symbol of Eternity.

achievements.name: The Princess Behind the Curtain
achievements.desc: Officially make the acquaintance of the young lady of the Kamisato Clan.

achievements.name: Omamori, Justice, Number One
achievements.desc: Complete the "three small wishes."

achievements.name: Jailhouse Fiesta
achievements.desc: Rescue Masakatsu successfully.

achievements.name: To Brave the Lightning's Glow
achievements.desc: Become the target of the Vision Hunt Decree.

achievements.name: Revolutionary Outlander
achievements.desc: Successfully join the resistance.

achievements.name: The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia
achievements.desc: Complete "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia."

achievements.name: Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow
achievements.desc: Complete "Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow."

achievements.name: SWORDFISH II
achievements.desc: Obtain the trust of the Swordfish II squad.

achievements.name: Though Their Wishes Be Like Morning Dew...
achievements.desc: Find the person behind the distribution of the Delusions.

achievements.name: Fantabulous Firework Fiesta
achievements.desc: Set off fireworks to distract the guards.

achievements.name: Duel Before the Throne
achievements.desc: Emerge victorious in the duel before the throne.

achievements.name: Their Wishes
achievements.desc: Bring all the wishes upon the Statue of the Omnipresent God to fruition.

achievements.name: Omnipresence Over Mortals
achievements.desc: Complete "Omnipresence Over Mortals."

achievements.name: "All is Well"
achievements.desc: Help Wang Ping'an renovate Pervases' temple.

achievements.name: Anna's Adventures
achievements.desc: Help Anna become an adventurer.

achievements.name: Prelude to the Journey
achievements.desc: A young man is about to embark on a long journey...

achievements.name: Rise of the Jade Chamber
achievements.desc: Complete the reconstruction of the Jade Chamber.

achievements.name: Majesty of the Deep
achievements.desc: Defeat Beisht, Avenger of the Vortex.

achievements.name: A Former Dream
achievements.desc: Witness the truth of the village's history.

achievements.name: The Crane Returns on the Wind
achievements.desc: Complete "The Crane Returns on the Wind."
